short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Securely is the easiest way to share passwords, credit card numbers, and other private information.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Securely is the easiest way to share passwords, credit card numbers, and other sensitive information, Securely.

With one click, create simple end-to-end encrypted links that keep your passwords out of slack, email and sms chat databases.

End-to-end encryption
Securely uses the latest in browser cryptography to encrypt all information directly in your web browser, making your data impossible to be read by anyone other than the holder of the secure link. 

100% Data Deletion Guarantee
Unlike most messenger and email products and services, after you're done sharing your encrypted information, Securely offers a 100% guarantee that your encrypted data will be actually delete off of our servers immediately and permanently.

AES 256bit Encryption
Securely encrypts all of your informations with using AES-GCM256 - an algorithm that is effectively impossible to crack. And, of course, Securely only uses secure random numbers generated by the the browsers native crypto package.
